data.title: Music producer David Gest, ex-husband of Liza Minnelli, dies at 62
data.meta_description: LONDON - David Gest, a music producer and former husband of Liza Minelli, has died aged 62 in a London hotel. \n Gest's friend Imad Handi said he died Tuesday in London. \n The Metropolitan Police forcâ€¦
data.text:
LONDON - David Gest, a music producer and former husband of Liza Minelli, has died aged 62 in a London hotel.

Gest's friend Imad Handi said he died Tuesday in London.

The Metropolitan Police force said officers were called to "reports of an unexplained death of a man in his 60s" at the Four Seasons Hotel in London's Canary Wharf on Tuesday morning.

The force said an autopsy would take place "in due course."

In memoriam: 2016 celebrity deaths | 2015 celebrity deaths | First Coast area obituaries

Gest married Minnelli in 2002; they divorced in 2007.

He was also a friend of the late Michael Jackson and produced a documentary about the King of Pop.

Gest gained a following in Britain with appearances on reality TV shows including "Celebrity Big Brother."
